title: Venus Affairs - Overcome: Mission 4
description: When a landing party from the Starship Venus is captured by a brutal race of insect-like warriors, Chief Science Officer Bree Kerry must tap into her long-suppressed animal instincts in order to perform an erotic mating ritual with one of the aliens to earn the teamâ€™s freedom. But things get even more complicated when her fierce captor ignites a passion in Bree she can no longer deny.The missions of The Venus Affairs are erotic short stories which involve intense romantic and sexual encounters between the women of the Starship Venus and all manner of alien species throughout the universe. This explicit content is intended for mature audiences only.
author: Abbi Aaker
